column2:
draw.heatmap(mat=ac_mat,use_genes=use_genes_up,
             use_gene_label=use_gene_label_up,
             use_samples=colnames(ac_mat),
             phenotype_info=phe,use_phe=c('gender','stage'),
             main='Activity for Top up regulated drivers',scale='row',
             show_column_names = FALSE,
             cluster_rows=TRUE,cluster_columns=FALSE,
             clustering_distance_rows='euclidean',
             clustering_distance_columns='euclidean',
             clustering_method_rows = "complete",
             row_names_gp = gpar(fontsize = 10),
             show_row_names = TRUE,
             col=circlize::colorRamp2(breaks=seq(-2,2,length.out=10),
                                      colors=rev(brewer.pal(10,'Spectral')))
             )
